Megaton grinned maniacally, he was pleased with himself for the debris that=
 was Waspinator. "Assault Commander would be a great step to destiny YESSSS=
S" He was fealing rather cunning. The dragon in him said to do the same to =
Megatron and take leadership. The megatron DNA told him that he couldn't do=
 that without making enemies of the entire Predacon army. "When should I st=
art?" The giant creature looked down at the bot he'd just dubbed as his lea=
der. "I warn you, cross me and that will be you." He pointed a scaley finge=
r down at the charred bot refering to Megatrons possible fate.


  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  S=
ent: Friday, December 22, 2000 9:14 AM
  Subject: Following Megatrons troop=
s


       Megatron saw as Waspinator burst apart from the numerous missles=
 fired 
  by Megaton. It was quite remarkable. "How magnificent! I must say=
 you do 
  prove yourself very well." 
        Waspinator attempted to get =
back onto his feet, but mubled something 
  and went into stasis lock. 
   =
     "You seem like Predacon material. How would you like to be my Assault =

  Commander? You could lead my troops into battle. I like your...style of =

  fighting." Megatron said, waving the smoke from Waspinator with his hand=
. 
  "Yesss." 

        Nighteyes, in her panther beast mode, padded quietl=
y across the 
  ground, and crouched low as not to be seen. She was spying =
on Killfest. Her 
  orders were to find out where the heck he was going on =
his secret mission. 
  The Predacons could intercept transmissions, and dec=
ode them, but trying to 
  figure some of them out was just insanity. Thats=
 why Hell Beast 
  sent her, he couldnt make heads or tails about this litt=
le move. 
        Her eyes began to magnify. About 400 yards away, she saw =
Killfest and 
  some of the bots in the Ambush. She was to far away to make=
 out what they 
  were saying. For that she would have to move in closer. 
=
        Like a burst of wind, she lept up and ran as fast as she could unde=
r 
  the cover of the brush. Eyes dialated, and ears listening, she stopped=
 and 
  made it into a tree. Now, about 170 yars closer, she began to pick =
up the 
  conversation a little bit. Her audio receptors raised to full pow=
er, and she 
  could hear Killfest and his men like a whisper. 

        He=
ll Beast coughed agian. This virus or whatever was making him sick. 
  He n=
eeded a cure. Someone had to have it...someone. 
        He scanned through=
 the names of bots who he thought might have a cure, 
  or know something a=
bout treating him. His eyes rested on Shockwave. He was 
  smart, and most =
likely had experience in Virus warfare such as this. 
        "This is Sena=
tor Hell Beast calling Shockwave. I ask for you 
  assistance in treating a=
 rather pesky virus I was recently injected with. 
  Help would be apprecia=
ted, and payed for." He ended the transmission, wrapped 
  a blanket around=
 him, and dazed out in his sickness. 

        eGroups Sponsor
